verbs.description: regulations of hair salons hair salons that [V: are] operated by small - business owners must ensure the safety of their employees and clients state and federal regulations require that hair salon employees be trained on the proper way to cut style and color hair as well as how to protect customers while they are on the premises failure to follow hair salons occupational safety and health administration
